Description.SourceString: A common perk that increases the HP stat of all Heroes. Each point of HP allows the Hero to take one damage before dying. Heroes gain a small flat bonus, plus a percentage bonus based on their HP value.
Description.LocalizedString: A common perk that increases the HP stat of all Heroes. Each point of HP allows the Hero to take one damage before dying. Heroes gain a small flat bonus, plus a percentage bonus based on their HP value.
